ComicInfo.Summary:
Sam Slade and Jim Kidd get to Verdus, but both have lost about 30 years. Jim Kidd is now a baby and Sam Slade a young man in his prime.
Judge Dredd is captured by the Jolly Green Giant who tries to step on him. He escapes and ends up at a factory run by Colonel Sanders and filled with clones of Speedy Alka-Seltzer. Other clones of the Jolly Green Giant arrive and Dredd is captured and about to be subjected to brain surgery when the issue ends.
A warrior fighting droids comes up against the Reaper of Death
